verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for help, <S%H5833><s%> [And] rely <S%H8172><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> And trust <S%H982><s%> in chariots <S%H7393><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are many, <S%H7227><s%> And in horsemen <S%H6571><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are very <S%H3966><s%> strong, <S%H6105><s%> But they do not look <S%H8159><s%> to the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> the Lord! <S%H3068><s%>

Yet He also <S%H1571><s%> is wise <S%H2450><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> disaster, <S%H9563><s%> And does not retract <S%H5493><s%> His words, <S%H1697><s%> But will arise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> And against <S%H5921><s%> the help <S%H5833><s%> of the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>

Now the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are men, <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> And their horses <S%H5483><s%> are flesh <S%H1320><s%> and not spirit; <S%H7307><s%> So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will stretch <S%H5186><s%> out His hand, <S%H3027><s%> And he who helps <S%H5826><s%> will stumble <S%H3782><s%> And he who is helped <S%H5826><s%> will fall, <S%H5307><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> of them will come <S%H3615><s%> to an end <S%H3615><s%> together. <S%H9191><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to me, "As the lion <S%H9030><s%> or the young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> growls <S%H1897><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his prey, <S%H2964><s%> Against <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> a band <S%H4393><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> out, Will not be terrified <S%H2865><s%> at their voice, <S%H6963><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> disturbed <S%H6031><s%> at their noise, <S%H1995><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> will the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to wage <S%H6633><s%> war <S%H6633><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> and on its hill. <S%H1389><s%>"

Like flying <S%H5774><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will protect <S%H1598><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> He will protect <S%H1598><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> [it;] He will pass <S%H6452><s%> over <S%H6452><s%> and rescue <S%H4422><s%> [it.]
Return <S%H7725><s%> to Him from whom <S%H834><s%> you have deeply <S%H6009><s%> defected, <S%H5627><s%> O sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For in that day <S%H3117><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will cast <S%H3988><s%> away <S%H3988><s%> his silver <S%H3701><s%> idols <S%H457><s%> and his gold <S%H2091><s%> idols, <S%H457><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> as a sin. <S%H2399><s%>

And the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by a sword <S%H2719><s%> not of man, <S%H376><s%> And a sword <S%H2719><s%> not of man <S%H120><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> him. So he will not escape <S%H5127><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> And his young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> forced <S%H4522><s%> laborers. <S%H4522><s%>

"And his rock <S%H5553><s%> will pass <S%H5674><s%> away <S%H5674><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of panic, <S%H4032><s%> And his princes <S%H8269><s%> will be terrified <S%H2865><s%> at the standard, <S%H5251><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> fire <S%H217><s%> is in Zion <S%H6726><s%> and whose furnace <S%H8574><s%> is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
